com.vorlonsoft.android.rate

Class AppCompatDialogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vorlonsoft.android.rate.DefaultDialogManager
      • com.vorlonsoft.android.rate.AppCompatDialogManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DialogManager

    public class AppCompatDialogManager
extends DefaultDialogManager
implements DialogManager

    AppCompatDialogManager Class - v7 AppCompat library dialog manager class implements DialogManager interface of the AndroidRate library. DefaultDialogManager Class will be used for API levels below 14 instead, see AppCompatDialogManager.Factory.createDialogManager(Context, DialogOptions, StoreOptions).

    You can extend AppCompatDialogManager Class and use AppRate.setDialogManagerFactory(DialogManager.Factory) if you want to use fully custom dialog (from v7 AppCompat library). AppCompatDialogManager Class is thread-safe and a fast singleton implementation inside library, not outside (protected, not private constructor).

    Since:
    1.2.1
    Version:
    1.2.1
    Author:
    Alexander Savin
    See Also:
    AppCompatDialogManager.Factory, DefaultDialogManager, DialogManager
